pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tumor Clones Percentage Estimations // Includes R functions for the estimation of tumor clones percentages for both snp data and (whole) genome sequencing data. See Cheng, Y., Dai, J. Y., Paulson, T. G., Wang, X., Li, X., Reid, B. J., Kooperberg, C. (2017). Quantification of multiple tumor clones using gene array and sequencing data. The Annals of Applied Statistics, 11(2), 967-991, doi:10.1214/17-AOAS1026 for more details.
